item.title: 2019 Year Review
item.description: 2019 was the most crazy year of my life. I wrote 3 drafts summarizing it, but my perspective kept changing. Instead I’m just publishing shortform what went down. January: the good: got into the 6 uni classes I wanted. Super amped! the growth: split with gf of ~3 years. Really sad. Distracting myself with exam prep. Each day: wake up, drink coffee, study, sleep. Strong support network kept me sane <3
